author: Unreal Sensei
description:
Substance Painter tutorial for beginners! In this free tutorial we will cover everything you need to know to get started texturing objects and creating high quality materials using Substance Painter. We will then go over how to use our materials in Unreal Engine 5 for our own games and animations. This video covers materials, texturing, painting, smart material creation, nanite displacement and much more!

You can get 6 months of Adobe Substance Painter and Modeler after purchasing $25 or more on Fab here:
https://www.fab.com/adobe-promo

Check out the Unreal Masterclass:
https://www.unrealmasterclass.com

Downloadable Substance Smart Material and Assets to Follow the Tutorial:
https://www.unrealsensei.com/substancepainter

UE5 Beginner Tutorial:
https://youtu.be/k-zMkzmduqI

Follow on Twitter!
http://x.com/unrealsensei

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
2:11 - Creating a Project
5:51 - Navigation and UI
14:37 - First Material with Fill Layers
18:18 - Textures
25:33 - Mask
30:42 - Effects
33:38
title: Substance Painter Beginner Tutorial for Unreal Engine 5
